thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 14 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Kinder Morgan Says Stockholders Approved Proposal Relating To An Annual Sustainability Report

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Kinder Morgan Says Stockholders Approved Proposal Relating To An Annual Sustainability Report
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Kinder Morgan Inc:
* KINDER MORGAN INC - KMI STOCKHOLDERS APPROVED STOCKHOLDER PROPOSAL RELATING TO AN ANNUAL SUSTAINABILITY REPORT - SEC FILING
* KINDER MORGAN - STOCKHOLDERS ELECTED SIXTEEN DIRECTORS, EACH TO SERVE UNTIL CO’S 2019 ANNUAL MEETING AT ITS 2018 ANNUAL MEETING
* KINDER MORGAN INC - CO’S STOCKHOLDERS DID NOT APPROVE STOCKHOLDER PROPOSAL RELATING TO A REPORT ON METHANE EMISSIONS
* KINDER MORGAN-STOCKHOLDERS APPROVED STOCKHOLDER PROPOSAL RELATING TO ASSESSMENT OF LONG-TERM IMPACTS OF SCENARIOS CONSISTENT WITH CLIMATE CHANGE POLICIES Source bit.ly/2Kov8VE Further company coverage:
